props.title: Add widgets to your website
props.description: A guide to add widgets to your website
props.body:
Widgets are small pieces of code that can be added to your website to extend its functionality.

## Stats widget

```html
<iframe src="https:///website.codespace1.sublayer.io/stats-widget" height="400" />
```

<iframe src="https:///website.codespace1.sublayer.io/stats-widget" height="400" />

## Pool widget

```html
<iframe src="https:///website.codespace1.sublayer.io/pool-widget/<POOL_ID>" height="176" />
```

<iframe src="https:///website.codespace1.sublayer.io/pool-widget/351a90a0253fb3595ccc460438b9947cd8a0b9a7f457f3478bbb31d8" height="176" />
